text:
Never go here if you have learning disability. there is no help from the prof and the assistant lecturer if you don't know the concept. Exit interview is more like down talking you of being lazy instead of finding the source of the problem.

they will use your "religion" to insult you like if you down out God will punish you etc.
edited& near this university any a good playground too
SMOKING INSTITUTE. Every few hours they gather at the curve at the end of Dover Drive to smoke. Not much in life is certain, but this is! And the admin do nothing about it.

No reply for email and even call also no one can answer about the admission details. Please don't put the course on your portal if no staff can answer or confirm the details! It is wasting time for trying to register the course.
My application experience was smooth-sailing, with no major hiccups. However, the course I was accepted into, Information Security, is too specialised and could be more holistic.
